00001 #ifndef INITIALIZER_HPP
00002 #define INITIALIZER_HPP
00003 
00004 #include <cstdio>
00005 #include <cstdlib>
00006 #include <unistd.h>
00007 #include <sys/types.h>
00008 #include <termios.h>
00009 #include <signal.h>
00011 std::list<Job*>                 jobList; 
00012 struct termios                  shooSHTermios; 
00013 pid_t                                   shooSHPGID; 
00014 
00015 struct sigaction sa_chld; 
00016 struct sigaction sa_ttin; 
00017 struct sigaction sa_ttou; 
00018 
00022 void hanchld (int signum, siginfo_t *siginfo, void* context) {
00023 
00024         std::list<Job*>::iterator curr, end;
00025         int status;
00026         int err;
00027         
00028         // procura o job
00029         for (curr = jobList.begin(), end = jobList.end(); curr != end && (*curr)->getPGID() != siginfo->si_pid; curr++);
00030 
00031         if (siginfo->si_code == CLD_KILLED || siginfo->si_code == CLD_EXITED) {
00032                 if (curr != end) {
00033                         std::cout << '[' << (*curr)->getID() << "]\tFinalizado\t" << (*curr)->getCommand() << std::endl;
00034                         if (!(*curr)->inBG()) { // se o job estava em foreground, retorna o terminal para a shell
00035                                 tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSADRAIN, &shooSHTermios);
00036                                 tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, shooSHPGID);
00037                         }
00038                         (*curr)->destroy(); // desaloca a memoria do job finalizado
00039                         jobList.erase (curr); // retira o job da lista
00040                 }
00041         } else if (siginfo->si_code == CLD_STOPPED) {
00042                 if (curr != end) {
00043                         tcgetattr (STDIN_FILENO, (*curr)->getTermios());
00044                         if (!(*curr)->inBG()) {
00045                                 tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSADRAIN, &shooSHTermios);
00046                                 tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, shooSHPGID);
00047                         }
00048                         (*curr)->stop();
00049                         (*curr)->print();
00050                 } else {
00051                         tcsetattr (STDIN_FILENO, TCSADRAIN, &shooSHTermios);
00052                         tcsetpgrp (STDIN_FILENO, shooSHPGID);
00053                 }
00054         } else if (siginfo->si_code == CLD_CONTINUED) {
00055                 (*curr)->cont();
00056                 (*curr)->print();
00057         }
00058 }

00063 void hanttin(int signum, siginfo_t *siginfo, void* context){
00064         fprintf(stderr, "TTIN no processo %d\n", getpid());
00065 }
00066 
00067 
00071 void hanttou (int signum){
00072         fprintf(stderr, "TTOU no processo %d\n", getpid());
00073 }
00074 
00075 
00079 void init_tty (void){
00080         
00081         int term = STDIN_FILENO;
00082         shooSHPGID = getpgrp(); // Pega o meu group ID
00083                 
00084         if( isatty(term) ){
00085                 /*Enquanto nao tiver em foreground*/
00086                 while( tcgetpgrp(term) != shooSHPGID ){ //Enquanto eu nao estiver em foreground
00087                         kill(-tcgetpgrp(term), SIGTTIN ); //Tenta depor a shell
00088                         shooSHPGID = getpgrp();
00089                 }
00090                 
00091                 /*Ignorando sinais*/ 
00092                 signal (SIGINT, SIG_IGN);
00093                 signal (SIGQUIT, SIG_IGN);
00094                 
00095                 sa_chld.sa_sigaction = &hanchld;
00096                 sa_chld.sa_flags = SA_SIGINFO;
00097                 sigaddset (&(sa_chld.sa_mask), SIGINT);
00098                 sigaddset (&(sa_chld.sa_mask), SIGQUIT);
00099                 sigaddset (&(sa_chld.sa_mask), SIGTTIN);
00100                 sigaddset (&(sa_chld.sa_mask), SIGTTOU);
00101                 sigaddset (&(sa_chld.sa_mask), SIGCHLD);
00102                 sigaddset (&(sa_chld.sa_mask), SIGCONT);
00103                 sigaddset (&(sa_chld.sa_mask), SIGTSTP);
00104 
00105                 sa_ttin.sa_sigaction = &hanttin;
00106                 sa_ttin.sa_flags = SA_SIGINFO;
00107 
00108                 sa_ttou.sa_handler = &hanttou;
00109                 sa_ttou.sa_flags = 0;
00110 
00111 
00112                 /*Tratamento de sinais*/
00113                 sigaction (SIGCHLD, &sa_chld, NULL);
00114                 sigaction (SIGTTIN, &sa_ttin, NULL);
00115                 sigaction (SIGTTOU, &sa_ttou, NULL);
00116                 signal (SIGTSTP, SIG_IGN);
00117                 
00118                 
00119                 shooSHPGID = getpid(); // Pega o meu pid
00120                 if( setpgid(shooSHPGID, shooSHPGID) < 0){ // Seta o meu group ID como o meu PID
00121                         fprintf(stderr, "Erro: nao foi possivel setar o group ID\n");
00122                         exit(1);
00123                 }
00124                 
00125                 tcsetpgrp( term, shooSHPGID ); //Seta o meu group ID como o dono do terminal
00126                 tcgetattr( term, &shooSHTermios ); //Pega meus atributos
00127         }
00128 };
00130 #endif
